name: Hydra Lairs
description: Homes of multi-headed hydras create dangerous environments with potential treasures and magical materials. The hydra's regenerative abilities make it nearly impossible to kill, while the valuable materials and magical properties create opportunities for brave adventurers.
atmosphere: Multiple serpentine heads hiss from various directions while the lair reeks of reptilian musk and spilled blood. Severed heads in various stages of regeneration litter the floor alongside valuable scales and magical materials. Acidic pools eat through stone. Each wound only makes the creature stronger.
